item.title: Akerna Corp S-1
item.description: Akerna Corp, which is in the Services-Computer Processing & Data Preparation [7374] industry, SEC S-1 filing on June 15, 2022 had 72917 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: stock - 787 instances 31 - 596 instances shares - 574 instances common - 523 instances financial - 503 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
